column1: Language Sciences (Sign Language and Deaf Studies) MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe Language Sciences MSc programme provides an opportunity for in-depth study in one or more areas of language science. It is an umbrella degree with four separate specialised routes. Each route follows a common structure, enabling students to tailor the degree to their own interests.About this degreeThe Language Sciences MSc programme provides an opportunity for in-depth study in one or more areas of language science. It is an umbrella degree with four separate specialised routes. Each route follows a common structure, enabling students to tailor the degree to their own interests.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
